keyboard_virtual_status: This function can be used to get the status of the virtual keyboard on the device running the game. The function will return <tt>true</tt> if the OS virtual keyboard is visible/being shown or <tt>false</tt> if it is hidden/hiding.

{ANY_CODE} var _status = keyboard_virtual_status();
if _status == false
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x1} {nbsp_x1} keyboard_virtual_show(kbv_type_numbers, kbv_returnkey_default, kbv_autocapitalize_none, false);
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code will show the OS virtual keyboard if the current status is <tt>false</tt>.
